settings.title: Corporate Gifting
settings.subtitle: Want to gift UnHide to your team? Well, now you can! From client gifts to employee recognition, think of UnHide as a thoughtful, more meaningful way to give a gift that they will use every day. The person who receives your gift will think of you every time they cuddle up!
settings.form_paragraph: Use the form below to request (and even personalize) your corporate gift order. Once you submit the form, a member of our team will get in touch soon to help finalize the details.
